overview.en: Tether is a fiat-pegged digital currency. USDT issued on the Bitcoin blockchain via the Omni Layer protocol was the first version of Tether. As of September 1, 2025, USDT on the Omni Layer has ceased to be supported and no longer holds any value.
overview.zh: Tethers 是一种法币挂钩的数字货币，基于 Omni Layer 协议的 USDT 在 Bitcoin 区块链上以代币形式首次发行。自 2025-09-01 起发行在 Omni Layer 的 USDT 已经停止支持，将不再具备任何价值；
